help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Quick guidance for the main wallet flows. Update this file to maintain labels and help content in one place.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.intro: Use these first steps when a user opens the app for the first time.

signIn.label: Sign in
signIn.description: Use your username and password on the login page. If you are new, create an account first from the sign-up page.

pickTheme.label: Pick a theme
pickTheme.description: Use the Light/Dark switch on login or sign-up. Your theme preference is saved automatically.

openDashboard.label: Open dashboard
openDashboard.description: After sign in, you land on Dashboard where all balances are shown by currency account.

hideZero.label: Hide zero balances
hideZero.description: Use the checkbox in the top-right to only show accounts with non-zero available/total values.

viewStatement.label: View statement
viewStatement.description: Click any account card to open its statement with transaction history and date filters.

createPayment.label: Create payment
createPayment.description: Enter recipient PayID, amount, and currency, then continue to review before sending.

reviewConfirm.label: Review and confirm
reviewConfirm.description: Confirm details carefully. Once posted, payment status and reference appear in Payment History.

getQuote.label: Get quote
getQuote.description: Select buy/sell currencies and amount, then request a quote.

quoteExpiry.label: Quote expiry
quoteExpiry.description: Quotes have a countdown timer. If it expires, request a new quote before booking.

bookDeal.label: Book deal
bookDeal.description: Book the quote to complete exchange and generate references visible in Exchange History.

paymentHistory.label: Payment History
paymentHistory.description: See sent payment records with date/time, reference, parties, amount, and status.

exchangeHistory.label: Exchange History
exchangeHistory.description: See booked FX deals, rates, conversion values, and value dates.

cantSignIn.label: Can't sign in
cantSignIn.description: Check username/password carefully and verify API availability. Try again after a few seconds.

pageNotFound.label: Page not found after deploy
pageNotFound.description: Ensure staticwebapp.config.json exists in the deployed artifact for SPA route fallback.

themeLogoWrong.label: Theme/logo looks wrong
themeLogoWrong.description: Toggle theme once and refresh. The app saves theme under local storage key app_theme.
